March of the Lich King.name: Ransack
March of the Lich King.text: Deal $1 damage to a minion. If you've played a card from another class this turn, deal $4 instead.
March of the Lich King.flavor:
"Fred's a talking ghoul. He can do whatever he wants."
"I want to steal!"

March of the Lich King.name: Shadow of Demise
March of the Lich King.text: Each time you cast a spell, transform this into a copy of it.
March of the Lich King.flavor: Each time you cast a spell, transform this into a copy of its flavor text.

March of the Lich King.name: Undying Allies
March of the Lich King.text: After you play an Undead this turn, give it Reborn.
March of the Lich King.flavor: Best friends FOREVER.

March of the Lich King.name: Animate Dead
March of the Lich King.text:
Resurrect a friendly minion that costs (3)
or less.
March of the Lich King.flavor: In the old days they used to animate the dead one bone at a time... it's all done by computer now.

March of the Lich King.name: Arcane Bolt
March of the Lich King.text: Deal $2 damage. Manathirst (8): Deal $3 damage instead.
March of the Lich King.flavor: Just you wait until I have 8 mana!

March of the Lich King.name: Arcane Wyrm
March of the Lich King.text: Battlecry: Add an Arcane Bolt to your hand.
March of the Lich King.flavor: Arcane Bolt on you, Arcane Bolt on your cow, Arcane Bolt on your whole family!

March of the Lich King.name: Arms Dealer
March of the Lich King.text: After you summon an Undead, give it +1 Attack.
March of the Lich King.flavor: Need a hand?

March of the Lich King.name: Banshee
March of the Lich King.text: Deathrattle: Give a random friendly Undead +2/+1.
March of the Lich King.flavor: :O
March of the Lich King.howToGetGold: Unlocked with "Blight of the Scourge" Achievement.

March of the Lich King.name: Blazing Transmutation
March of the Lich King.text: [x]Choose a minion. Discover one that costs (1) more to transform it into.
March of the Lich King.flavor: Congratulations! Your minion evolved into a Fire type!

March of the Lich King.name: Calamity's Grasp
March of the Lich King.text: Deathrattle: Add a random Outcast card to your hand.
March of the Lich King.flavor: Kel'Thuzad's personal fidget spinner.

March of the Lich King.name: Cold Storage
March of the Lich King.text: Freeze a minion. Add a copy of it to your hand.
March of the Lich King.flavor: Sapphiron's favorite treat always was popsicles.

March of the Lich King.name: Concoctor
March of the Lich King.text: Battlecry: Add a random Concoction to your hand.
March of the Lich King.flavor: "A dash of death, with a pinch of death, and a sprinkle of… death!"

March of the Lich King.name: Crystalsmith Cultist
March of the Lich King.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Shadow spell, gain +1/+1.
March of the Lich King.flavor: "I just think they're neat."

March of the Lich King.name: Devourer of Souls
March of the Lich King.text: After a friendly minion dies, gain its Deathrattle.
March of the Lich King.flavor: Winner of the Scourge's annual funnel cake devouring contest 12 years running.

March of the Lich King.name: Fierce Outsider
March of the Lich King.text: Rush Outcast: Your next Outcast card costs (1) less.
March of the Lich King.flavor: Look, if you stopped breaking stuff you wouldn't have to stay outside.

March of the Lich King.name: Flight of the Bronze
March of the Lich King.text: [x]Discover a Dragon. Manathirst (7): Summon a 5/5 Drake with Taunt.
March of the Lich King.flavor: You're telling me Hearthstone will make a 1 Mana 5/5 with Taunt? Maybe when bronze flies!

March of the Lich King.name: Foul Egg
March of the Lich King.text: Deathrattle: Summon a 3/3 Undead Chicken.
March of the Lich King.flavor: Definitely expired.
March of the Lich King.howToGetGold: Unlocked with "Look at All Those Chickens!" Achievement.

March of the Lich King.name: Ghostly Strike
March of the Lich King.text: Deal $1 damage. Combo: Draw a card.
March of the Lich King.flavor: …What are their demands?

March of the Lich King.name: Jolly Roger
March of the Lich King.text:
After your hero
attacks, summon a
1/1 Undead Pirate.
March of the Lich King.flavor: That's a great pose, Roger. But this time try happier, and with your mouth open.

March of the Lich King.name: Last Stand
March of the Lich King.text: Draw a Taunt minion. Manathirst (7): Double its stats.
March of the Lich King.flavor: If you play two Last Stands in one game, you're a liar.

March of the Lich King.name: Lingering Zombie
March of the Lich King.text: [x]Deathrattle: Summon a 1/1 Disarmed Zombie with "Deathrattle: Summon a 1/1 Zombie."

March of the Lich King.name: Mind Sear
March of the Lich King.text:
Deal $2 damage to a minion. If it dies,
deal $3 damage to the enemy hero.
March of the Lich King.flavor: Ride or die, or both.

March of the Lich King.name: Mistake
March of the Lich King.text: This has all minion types.
March of the Lich King.flavor: We like to think of it as a happy accident.

March of the Lich King.name: Rake
March of the Lich King.text:
[x]Give your hero +2 Attack
this turn. Deal damage
equal to your hero's
Attack to a minion.
March of the Lich King.flavor: When you're done shredding through your enemies, use it on your leaves!

March of the Lich King.name: Ricochet Shot
March of the Lich King.text:
Deal $1 damage to
three random enemies.
March of the Lich King.flavor: Simple geometry? Actually, I find it's quite complex.

March of the Lich King.name: Sanguine Soldier
March of the Lich King.text: Divine Shield Battlecry: Deal 2 damage to your hero.
March of the Lich King.flavor: They just need someone to ouch for them.

March of the Lich King.name: Scourge Troll
March of the Lich King.text: Deathrattles given to this minion trigger twice.
March of the Lich King.flavor: This is where I'd put my Deathrattle - IF I HAD ONE!

March of the Lich King.name: Shambling Chow
March of the Lich King.text: Rush Deathrattle: Deal 4 damage to your hero.
March of the Lich King.flavor: And step, and shamble, and step, and flip the hair!

March of the Lich King.name: Sunfury Champion
March of the Lich King.text:
[x]After you cast a Fire
spell, deal 1 damage
to all minions.
March of the Lich King.flavor: Champion of the Great Blood Elf Bake Off 12 years running.

March of the Lich King.name: Training Session
March of the Lich King.text: Discover a Taunt minion. If you play it this turn, repeat this.
March of the Lich King.flavor: Instructor Razuvious's training turns the Scourge's Death Knights into hardened killing machines. His merciless routines focus on breaking down his underlings until they build up a resistance to his strength.

March of the Lich King.name: Trinket Tracker
March of the Lich King.text: Battlecry: Draw a 1-Cost spell.
March of the Lich King.flavor:
Dashing through the snow
On an undead trinket craze
Over the hills we go
Tracking all the way!

March of the Lich King.name: Unleash Fel
March of the Lich King.text: Deal $1 damage to all enemies. Manathirst_(6): With Lifesteal.
March of the Lich King.flavor: Why'd you put it on a leash in the first place?

March of the Lich King.name: Wither
March of the Lich King.text:
[x]Choose a minion. Each
friendly Undead steals 1
Attack and Health from it.
March of the Lich King.flavor: The opponent's minion can't live wither without you.

March of the Lich King.name: Arcane Quiver
March of the Lich King.text: [x]Discover a spell from your deck. If it's Arcane, give it Spell Damage +1.
March of the Lich King.flavor:
"Quiver in fear!" - The Lich King
"Ok." - Me

March of the Lich King.name: Astalor Bloodsworn
March of the Lich King.text: Battlecry: Add Astalor, the Protector to your hand. Manathirst (@): Deal 2 damage.
March of the Lich King.flavor: I hear his third phase is even more intense.

March of the Lich King.name: Blazing Power
March of the Lich King.text:
[x]Give a minion +1/+1.
Repeat for each damaged
friendly character.
March of the Lich King.flavor: Apply heat directly to the damaged area.

March of the Lich King.name: Blood Matriarch Liadrin
March of the Lich King.text: After you summon a minion with less Attack than this, give it Divine Shield and Rush.
March of the Lich King.flavor: All's fair in blood and war.
March of the Lich King.howToGetSignature: Obtainable in March of the Lich King card packs.
March of the Lich King.howToGetDiamond: Obtained by owning 27 March of the Lich King Legendary cards.

March of the Lich King.name: Bone Flinger
March of the Lich King.text: [x]Battlecry: If a friendly Undead died after your last turn, deal 2 damage.
March of the Lich King.flavor: It’s the scourge bringing, plague slinging, bone flinging basher!

March of the Lich King.name: Chitinous Plating
March of the Lich King.text: Gain 4 Armor. At the start of your next turn, gain 4 more.
March of the Lich King.flavor: Durable, detachable and dishwasher safe.

March of the Lich King.name: Conjured Arrow
March of the Lich King.text: Deal $2 damage to a minion. Manathirst (6): Draw that many cards.
March of the Lich King.flavor: We just call them "cursors".

March of the Lich King.name: Coroner
March of the Lich King.text: Battlecry: Freeze an enemy minion. Manathirst (6): Silence it first.
March of the Lich King.flavor: It was at this moment the Coroner decided to become a farmer instead.

March of the Lich King.name: Deathweaver Aura
March of the Lich King.text: Give a minion "Deathrattle: Summon two 3/2 Zombies." Overload: (1)
March of the Lich King.flavor: Knitting is a harmless hobby. Weaving, though...

March of the Lich King.name: Embers of Strength
March of the Lich King.text: [x]Summon two 1/2 Guards with Taunt. Manathirst (6): Give them +1/+2.
March of the Lich King.flavor: Remember, remember, the 1/2's of Ember.

March of the Lich King.name: Feast and Famine
March of the Lich King.text: Give your hero +3 Attack this turn. Manathirst (4): And Lifesteal.
March of the Lich King.flavor: Please sir, may I have some armor?

March of the Lich King.name: For Quel'Thalas!
March of the Lich King.text:
[x]Give a friendly minion
+3 Attack. Give your hero
+2 Attack this turn.
March of the Lich King.flavor: For kwell-kell.. for kell… for kwee- for the city!

March of the Lich King.name: Ghoulish Alchemist
March of the Lich King.text: Battlecry: Your next Concoction costs (0).
March of the Lich King.flavor: AND I THREW IT ON THE GROUND!

March of the Lich King.name: Incorporeal Corporal
March of the Lich King.text:
After this minion attacks,
destroy it.
March of the Lich King.flavor: You won't believe how long this was called "Incorporal Corporeal"…

March of the Lich King.name: Infected Peasant
March of the Lich King.text: Deathrattle: Summon a 2/2 Undead Peasant.
March of the Lich King.flavor: The peasants are revolting!

March of the Lich King.name: Magister's Apprentice
March of the Lich King.text:
Your Arcane spells
cost (1) less.
March of the Lich King.flavor: "If this is the work I'll be doing, maybe I don't want to be just like you someday..."

March of the Lich King.name: Mark of Scorn
March of the Lich King.text:
[x]Draw a card. If it's not a
minion, deal $3 damage to
the lowest Health enemy.
March of the Lich King.flavor: Threat Level who? Mark of Scorn!

March of the Lich King.name: Mind Eater
March of the Lich King.text: Deathrattle: Add a copy of a card in your opponent's deck to your hand.
March of the Lich King.flavor: Watch out brain, she'll chew you up! She's a Mind Eater!

March of the Lich King.name: Necrotic Mortician
March of the Lich King.text: Battlecry: If a friendly Undead died after your last turn, Discover an Unholy Rune card.
March of the Lich King.flavor: Her hair, just like her name, is full of 'tic's.

March of the Lich King.name: Nerubian Flyer
March of the Lich King.text: [x]Battlecry: If a friendly Undead died after your last turn, summon a 2/2 Nerubian.
March of the Lich King.flavor: Undead Air Miles only cover Northrend and the surrounding coast.

March of the Lich King.name: Nofin's Imp-ossible
March of the Lich King.text: Give all friendly Demons and Murlocs "Deathrattle: Summon a 2/2 Imploc."
March of the Lich King.flavor: They have faces only a morrglr could love.

March of the Lich King.name: Potion Belt
March of the Lich King.text: [x]Discover 2 Concoctions.
March of the Lich King.flavor: Pick your poison.

March of the Lich King.name: Potionmaster Putricide
March of the Lich King.text: After a minion dies, add a Concoction to your hand.
March of the Lich King.flavor: "Good news everyone! I'm a Rogue card now!"
March of the Lich King.howToGetSignature: Obtainable in March of the Lich King card packs.

March of the Lich King.name: Prismatic Elemental
March of the Lich King.text: Battlecry: Discover a spell from any class. It costs (1) less.
March of the Lich King.flavor: Disappointed they were rejected from the Magical Guardian tryouts.

March of the Lich King.name: Rotten Rodent
March of the Lich King.text: Battlecry: Reduce the Cost of all Deathrattle cards in your deck by (1).
March of the Lich King.flavor: It's dead, but it's not a mouse.

March of the Lich King.name: Scourge Tamer
March of the Lich King.text: Battlecry: Craft a custom Zombeast.
March of the Lich King.flavor: He's a hunter AND a gatherer.

March of the Lich King.name: Shallow Grave
March of the Lich King.text: Trigger a friendly minion's Deathrattle, then destroy it.
March of the Lich King.flavor: Jumpscare!

March of the Lich King.name: Silvermoon Farstrider
March of the Lich King.text: Battlecry: Give all Arcane spells in your hand Spell Damage +1.
March of the Lich King.flavor: Surprisingly nearsighted.

March of the Lich King.name: Suspicious Peddler
March of the Lich King.text: [x]Battlecry: Discover a 1-Cost card. If your opponent guesses your __choice, they get a copy.
March of the Lich King.flavor: The best snake oil this side of Azeroth.

March of the Lich King.name: Umbral Geist
March of the Lich King.text: [x]Deathrattle: Add a random Shadow spell to your hand.
March of the Lich King.flavor: “After all, one can't leave his shadow lying about and not miss it sooner or later, don't you agree?”

March of the Lich King.name: Vampiric Blood
March of the Lich King.text: [x]Give your hero +5 Health. Spend 3 Corpses to gain 5 more and draw a card.
March of the Lich King.flavor: BLEH, BLEH BLEH!

March of the Lich King.name: Vast Wisdom
March of the Lich King.text: Discover two spells that cost (3) or less. Swap their Costs.
March of the Lich King.flavor: My wisdom is SO vast that I can count up to THREE!

March of the Lich King.name: Vrykul Necrolyte
March of the Lich King.text: [x]Battlecry: Give a friendly minion "Deathrattle: Summon a 2/2 Zombie with Rush."
March of the Lich King.flavor: If at first you don't succeed, vry, vry again.

March of the Lich King.name: Wretched Exile
March of the Lich King.text: [x]After you play an Outcast card, add a random Outcast card to your hand.
March of the Lich King.flavor: If you're cold, they're cold. Let your wretches inside.

March of the Lich King.name: ZOMBEEEES!!!
March of the Lich King.text: Secret: After your opponent plays a minion, summon four 1/1 Zombees to attack it.
March of the Lich King.flavor: In your brain, in your brain, Zombees, Zombees, Zombees-ees-ees.

March of the Lich King.name: Acolyte of Death
March of the Lich King.text: After a friendly Undead dies, draw a card.
March of the Lich King.flavor: "I see dead people. A LOT of dead people."

March of the Lich King.name: Amber Whelp
March of the Lich King.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, deal 3 damage.
March of the Lich King.flavor: What is a Bronze Whelp's favorite garnish? A little thyme!

March of the Lich King.name: Arcsplitter
March of the Lich King.text: Deathrattle: Add 2 Arcane Bolts to your hand.
March of the Lich King.flavor: Shockspitter, Arcsplitter, what's next?
March of the Lich King.howToGetSignature: Earnable in The Lich King's Call special event.

March of the Lich King.name: Asvedon, the Grandshield
March of the Lich King.text: Taunt Battlecry: Cast a copy of the last spell your opponent played.
March of the Lich King.flavor: If you think that's strong, you should see his Great Great Grandshield.
March of the Lich King.howToGetSignature: Obtainable in March of the Lich King card packs.

March of the Lich King.name: Bloodied Knight
March of the Lich King.text:
[x]At the end of your turn,
deal 2 damage to
your hero.
March of the Lich King.flavor: Chillwind Yeti would NEVER betray you like this.

March of the Lich King.name: Brittleskin Zombie
March of the Lich King.text: Deathrattle: If it's your opponent's turn, deal 3 damage to them.
March of the Lich King.flavor: I was born with glass bones and paper skin.

March of the Lich King.name: Crystal Broker
March of the Lich King.text: [x]Manathirst (5): Summon a random 3-Cost minion. Manathirst (10): Summon an 8-Cost minion instead.
March of the Lich King.flavor:
Broke: Crystals
Woke: Blueberry Fruit Gummies

March of the Lich King.name: Darkfallen Shadow
March of the Lich King.text: Rush Manathirst (@): Gain Reborn.
March of the Lich King.flavor: Manathirst AND Reborn?! Pick a side!

March of the Lich King.name: Drakkari Embalmer
March of the Lich King.text: Battlecry: Give a friendly Undead Reborn.
March of the Lich King.flavor: A troll in life, death, and online forums.

March of the Lich King.name: Enchanter
March of the Lich King.text: Enemy minions take double damage during your turn.
March of the Lich King.flavor: "I know Scourgebane! Your materials and tips appreciated!"
March of the Lich King.howToGetGold: Earnable after purchasing the March of the Lich King Tavern Pass.

March of the Lich King.name: Energy Shaper
March of the Lich King.text: [x]Battlecry: Transform all spells in your hand into ones that cost (2) more. (They keep their original Cost.)
March of the Lich King.flavor: '"I can do a snake for you?"

March of the Lich King.name: Frostfin Chomper
March of the Lich King.text: [x]Battlecry: If you played an Elemental last turn, summon three 1/1 Murlocs.
March of the Lich King.flavor: If you want good sushi, it is important to always keep your murlocs on ice.

March of the Lich King.name: Halduron Brightwing
March of the Lich King.text: Battlecry: Give all Arcane spells in your hand and [x]deck Spell Damage +1.
March of the Lich King.flavor: I wanted to generate a legendary, but I held da wrong Brightwing.
March of the Lich King.howToGetSignature: Obtainable in March of the Lich King card packs.

March of the Lich King.name: Haunting Nightmare
March of the Lich King.text: [x]Deathrattle: Haunt a card in your hand. When you play it, summon a 4/3 Soldier.
March of the Lich King.flavor: Not as scary as the one where all my teeth fall out.

March of the Lich King.name: Hawkstrider Rancher
March of the Lich King.text: [x]Whenever you play a minion, give it +1/+1 and "Deathrattle: Summon a_ 1/1 Hawkstrider."
March of the Lich King.flavor: I prefer the Hawkstrider Nacho Cheeser.

March of the Lich King.name: Hookfist-3000
March of the Lich King.text:
After your hero attacks, gain 4 Armor and
draw a card.
March of the Lich King.flavor: But wait! There's more!

March of the Lich King.name: Keeneye Spotter
March of the Lich King.text:
[x]Whenever your hero
attacks a minion, set
its Health to 1.
March of the Lich King.flavor: "No Rexxar, not the face, the minion right there. Yep that one righ-- Rexxar no!"

March of the Lich King.name: Knight of the Dead
March of the Lich King.text: [x]Battlecry: Deal 5 damage to your hero. Manathirst (7): Restore 5 Health to your hero instead.
March of the Lich King.flavor: A Paladin will follow their oath to slay the undead, even when they count themselves among them.

March of the Lich King.name: Meat Grinder
March of the Lich King.text: Battlecry: Shred a random minion in your deck to gain 4 Corpses.
March of the Lich King.flavor: After the Horde and Alliance sieged Icecrown Citadel, they took these back to use in their delis.

March of the Lich King.name: Nerubian Vizier
March of the Lich King.text: [x]Battlecry: Discover a spell. If a friendly Undead died after your last turn, it costs (2) less.
March of the Lich King.flavor: One of the essential constructors of the Northrend wide web.

March of the Lich King.name: Plague Eruption
March of the Lich King.text: Deal $2 damage to all minions. If you've discarded a card this game, deal $1 more.
March of the Lich King.flavor: Be prepared! (With tissues)

March of the Lich King.name: Rimescale Siren
March of the Lich King.text: [x]Battlecry: If you've cast three spells while holding this, Freeze 3 random enemy minions.@ ({0} left!)@ (Ready!)
March of the Lich King.flavor: She will freeze the Scourge dead in their tracks.

March of the Lich King.name: Scourge Rager
March of the Lich King.text: Reborn Battlecry: Die.
March of the Lich King.flavor: Why's he so mad? Well you'd be mad too if you were created as a joke!

March of the Lich King.name: Scourge Supplies
March of the Lich King.text:
Draw 3 cards.
Choose one to discard.
March of the Lich King.flavor: The Scourge is very pro-recycling.

March of the Lich King.name: Seal of Blood
March of the Lich King.text: Give a minion +3/+3 and Divine Shield. Deal $3 damage to your hero.
March of the Lich King.flavor: Don't hate! Coagulate!

March of the Lich King.name: Shadow Suffusion
March of the Lich King.text: [x]Give your minions "Deathrattle: Deal 3 damage to a random enemy."
March of the Lich King.flavor: Be honest - you had to look up what that means.

March of the Lich King.name: Silvermoon Arcanist
March of the Lich King.text: [x]Spell Damage +2 Battlecry: Your spells can’t target heroes this turn.
March of the Lich King.flavor: This turn only, I'm something of an Arcanist myself.

March of the Lich King.name: Silvermoon Sentinel
March of the Lich King.text: Taunt Manathirst (@): Gain +2/+2 and Divine Shield.
March of the Lich King.flavor: I spent 8 mana polishing this shield, PLEASE don't make me bash you with it.

March of the Lich King.name: Soulbreaker
March of the Lich King.text: After your hero attacks and kills a minion, gain 2 Corpses.
March of the Lich King.flavor: Two for one special!

March of the Lich King.name: Spectral Trainee
March of the Lich King.text:
After you cast a spell,
deal 1 damage to all enemy minions.
March of the Lich King.flavor: After graduating at the top of her class from Scholomance, she was granted an eternal scholarship to study abroad in Naxxramas.

March of the Lich King.name: Stitched Creation
March of the Lich King.text: Combo: Gain +2/+2. Infuse ({0}): Gain +3/+3. Manathirst ({1}): Gain +4/+4.
March of the Lich King.flavor: To defend Naxxramas from the oncoming adventurers, the Scourge created a monstrosity the world had never seen before: an abomination wearing clothes!!

March of the Lich King.name: Sunfury Clergy
March of the Lich King.text: [x]Battlecry: Restore 3 Health to all friendly characters. Manathirst (6): Restore 6 Health instead.
March of the Lich King.flavor: Why is the sun so mad? Won't anyone ask about its feelings?

March of the Lich King.name: Timewarden
March of the Lich King.text: [x]Battlecry: Until the end of your next turn, Dragons you summon gain Taunt and Divine Shield.
March of the Lich King.flavor: When are we getting the Silver, Gold, and Diamond dragonflight?

March of the Lich King.name: Unliving Champion
March of the Lich King.text: [x]Battlecry: If a friendly Undead died after your last turn, summon two 3/2 Zombies.
March of the Lich King.flavor: Unlive a little!

March of the Lich King.name: Vile Apothecary
March of the Lich King.text:
At the end of your turn,
add a random Concoction to your hand.
March of the Lich King.flavor: When he's feeling extra malicious, he uses the licorice-flavored one.

March of the Lich King.name: Walking Dead
March of the Lich King.text: Taunt If you discard this minion, summon it.
March of the Lich King.flavor: Watch out for the Scourge, KAAARRRRLLLL!

March of the Lich King.name: Whirlweaver
March of the Lich King.text: [x]Battlecry: If you've cast a spell last turn, Discover an Elemental.
March of the Lich King.flavor: Of all the creations from the Construct Quarter, a naga combined with water is the most intuitive.

March of the Lich King.name: Blightfang
March of the Lich King.text: [x]Battlecry: Infect all enemy minions. When they die, you summon a 2/2 Zombie with Taunt.
March of the Lich King.flavor: THE GIANT ENEMY SPIDER!

March of the Lich King.name: Bonecaller
March of the Lich King.text: [x]Taunt Deathrattle: Resurrect a friendly Undead that died this game.
March of the Lich King.flavor: Hello, am I speaking to the undead of the household? We have been trying to reach you about your skeleton's extended warranty.

March of the Lich King.name: Cannibalize
March of the Lich King.text: Destroy a minion. Restore its Health to all friendly characters.
March of the Lich King.flavor: The Silvermoon health inspector has some choice words for the Lich King.

March of the Lich King.name: Construct Quarter
March of the Lich King.text: [x]Destroy a friendly minion to summon a 4/5 Undead with Rush.
March of the Lich King.flavor: It's not alive! IT'S NOT ALIIIIIVE!!!

March of the Lich King.name: Daring Drake
March of the Lich King.text: [x]Rush Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, gain +1/+1.
March of the Lich King.flavor: First of all, how dare you? Second of all, how dare you!

March of the Lich King.name: Eversong Portal
March of the Lich King.text: [x]Summon $1 4/4 |4(Lynx, Lynxes) with Rush (improved by Spell Damage).
March of the Lich King.flavor: In retrospect, it's pretty impressive that they had the Lynxes just ready to go.

March of the Lich King.name: Fel'dorei Warband
March of the Lich King.text: Deal $4 damage. If your deck has no minions, summon four 1/1 Illidari with Rush.
March of the Lich King.flavor:
"Felerin, I made you a friendship bracelet!"
"...what? I said WARband, not WRISTband..."

March of the Lich King.name: Felerin, the Forgotten
March of the Lich King.text: [x]Battlecry: Add a random Outcast card to the left and right sides of your hand. They cost (2) less.
March of the Lich King.flavor: flavor text
March of the Lich King.howToGetSignature: Obtainable in March of the Lich King card packs.

March of the Lich King.name: Goldwing
March of the Lich King.text: [x]Rush Battlecry: If you're holding a Mech, gain Windfury.
March of the Lich King.flavor: This HAS to be worth more dust, right?

March of the Lich King.name: Grave Digging
March of the Lich King.text:
[x]Draw 2 cards.
Costs (1) if a friendly
Undead died after
your last turn.
March of the Lich King.flavor: Grave digging as a profession has high turnover; it's important to maintain headcount.

March of the Lich King.name: Light of the Phoenix
March of the Lich King.text: Draw 2 cards. Costs (1) less for each damaged friendly character.
March of the Lich King.flavor: It's 3 in the morning, could you PLEASE put out that phoenix?!

March of the Lich King.name: Lost Exarch
March of the Lich King.text: [x]Deathrattle: Spend all your Mana. Summon that many _2/2 Zombies with Rush.
March of the Lich King.flavor: She resisted the temptation of the Burning Legion's power only to fall victim to the Scourge.

March of the Lich King.name: Noxious Infiltrator
March of the Lich King.text: [x]Poisonous Battlecry: If a friendly Undead died after your last turn, deal 1 damage to a minion.
March of the Lich King.flavor: Noxious, but not toxic - he's very polite!

March of the Lich King.name: Plaguespreader
March of the Lich King.text: Deathrattle: Transform a random minion in your opponent's hand into a Plaguespreader.
March of the Lich King.flavor: What do they mean by Patient Zero? I'm very patient!

March of the Lich King.name: Prescience
March of the Lich King.text: Draw 2 minions. For each that costs (5) or more, summon a_ 2/3 Spirit with Taunt.
March of the Lich King.flavor: Wait don't change the channel! I love this vision.

March of the Lich King.name: Rotting Necromancer
March of the Lich King.text: Battlecry: Dredge. If it's an Undead, deal 5 damage to the enemy hero.
March of the Lich King.flavor: You can't spell dredge without D-E-D.

March of the Lich King.name: Sanctum Spellbender
March of the Lich King.text:
[x]Whenever your opponent
targets another minion with
a spell, redirect it to this.
March of the Lich King.flavor: "I'll take that... and that... aaand that."

March of the Lich King.name: Scourge Illusionist
March of the Lich King.text: [x]Deathrattle: Add a 4/4 copy of another Deathrattle minion in your deck to your hand. It costs (4) less.
March of the Lich King.flavor: They're not tricks! They're ILLUSIONS!

March of the Lich King.name: Shockspitter
March of the Lich King.text: Battlecry: Deal @ damage. (Improved by your hero attacks this game!)
March of the Lich King.flavor: That blue raspberry candy was very sour.

March of the Lich King.name: Silvermoon Armorer
March of the Lich King.text: [x]Rush Manathirst (@): Gain +2/+2.
March of the Lich King.flavor: All that glitters is silver.

March of the Lich King.name: Souleater's Scythe
March of the Lich King.text: [x]Start of Game: Consume 3 different minions in your deck. Leave behind Souls that Discover them.
March of the Lich King.flavor: Would you like those souls for here or to-go?

March of the Lich King.name: Street Sweeper
March of the Lich King.text: Battlecry: Deal 2 damage to all other minions.
March of the Lich King.flavor: The sweeper hit of the set.

March of the Lich King.name: Sunfire Smithing
March of the Lich King.text:
Equip a 4/2 Sword.
Give a random minion
in your hand +4/+2.
March of the Lich King.flavor: It's simple, just throw it into the sun.

March of the Lich King.name: Tear Reality
March of the Lich King.text:
[x]Add 2 random
Mage spells from the
past to your hand.
They cost (2) less.
March of the Lich King.flavor: One time it gave me a black flower, a smiling pot, and a foil first edition Dracthyr.

March of the Lich King.name: Thori'belore
March of the Lich King.text: [x]Rush. Deathrattle: Go Dormant. Cast a Fire spell to revive Thori'belore!
March of the Lich King.flavor: Mascot of QFC (Quel'Thelas Fried Chicken).

March of the Lich King.name: Twisted Tether
March of the Lich King.text:
Destroy a minion.
Give its stats to a random Undead in your hand.
March of the Lich King.flavor: First, convince your opponent that you just want to play tetherball. Then, you GET 'EM!

March of the Lich King.name: Amorphous Slime
March of the Lich King.text: Battlecry: Discard a random Undead. Deathrattle: Summon a copy of it.
March of the Lich King.flavor: A crucial component of the Lordaeroneon Choice Awards.

March of the Lich King.name: Beetlemancy
March of the Lich King.text: [x]Choose One - Gain 12 Armor; or Summon two 3/3 Beetles with Taunt.
March of the Lich King.flavor: Beetlemancy. Beetlemancy. Beetlemancy.

March of the Lich King.name: Corpse Explosion
March of the Lich King.text: Detonate a Corpse to deal $1 damage to all minions. If any are still alive, repeat this.
March of the Lich King.flavor: What? It's not like they were using them anymore.

March of the Lich King.name: Deal with a Devil
March of the Lich King.text: Summon two 3/3 Felfiends with Lifesteal. If your deck has no minions, summon another.
March of the Lich King.flavor: Fine, three Felfiends - final offer.

March of the Lich King.name: Disruptive Spellbreaker
March of the Lich King.text:
At the end of your turn, your
opponent discards a spell.
March of the Lich King.flavor: WHO IS THE BLOOD ELVES' DENTIST?

March of the Lich King.name: Elder Nadox
March of the Lich King.text: Battlecry: Destroy a friendly Undead. Your minions gain its Attack.
March of the Lich King.flavor: For an Undead, is an elder the least or most dead?

March of the Lich King.name: Harkener of Dread
March of the Lich King.text: [x]Taunt Deathrattle: Summon a 6/6 Undead with Taunt.
March of the Lich King.flavor: I hope it's good news!

March of the Lich King.name: High Cultist Basaleph
March of the Lich King.text: Battlecry: Resurrect all friendly Undead that died after your last turn.
March of the Lich King.flavor: "It's not a cult! It's a collection of like-minded individuals that enjoy undead. And rituals. And doing what I say. "
March of the Lich King.howToGetSignature: Obtainable in March of the Lich King card packs.

March of the Lich King.name: Infantry Reanimator
March of the Lich King.text: [x]Battlecry: Resurrect a friendly Undead. Give it Reborn.
March of the Lich King.flavor: Get a life! Or two!

March of the Lich King.name: Infectious Ghoul
March of the Lich King.text: [x]Deathrattle: Give a random friendly minion "Deathrattle: Summon an Infectious Ghoul."
March of the Lich King.flavor: They call him that because of his laughter! Also his plague.
March of the Lich King.howToGetSignature: Earnable in The Lich King's Call special event.

March of the Lich King.name: Rotgill
March of the Lich King.text: [x]Battlecry: Give your other minions "Deathrattle: Give __your minions +1/+1."
March of the Lich King.flavor:
In the summer: Hotgill.
Mechanized: Botgill.
Everyone else: Notgill.

March of the Lich King.name: Savage Ymirjar
March of the Lich King.text: Rush Battlecry: Discard 2 cards.
March of the Lich King.flavor: When is an Undead door not an Undead door? When it's a(Ymir)jar!

March of the Lich King.name: Shadow Word: Undeath
March of the Lich King.text: Deal $2 damage to all enemies. If a friendly Undead died after your last turn, deal $2 more.
March of the Lich King.flavor: We like to call it FUNdeath here!

March of the Lich King.name: Soul Barrage
March of the Lich King.text:
When you play
or discard this, deal $6 damage randomly split among all enemies.
March of the Lich King.flavor: Works especially well on jazz musicians.

March of the Lich King.name: Tenacious San'layn
March of the Lich King.text: Lifesteal Whenever this attacks, deal 2 damage to the enemy hero.
March of the Lich King.flavor: Once bitten, twice healed.

March of the Lich King.name: Translocation Instructor
March of the Lich King.text: [x]Battlecry: Choose an enemy minion. Swap it with a random one in their deck.
March of the Lich King.flavor: *Translocates behind you* psssh... nothin personnel, kid.

March of the Lich King.name: Vexallus
March of the Lich King.text:
Your Arcane spells
cast twice.
March of the Lich King.flavor: He only casts the spells once - it's Shmexallus that casts the copy.

March of the Lich King.name: Blood Crusader
March of the Lich King.text: [x]Battlecry: Your next Paladin minion this turn costs Health instead of Mana.
March of the Lich King.flavor: Defending Silvermoon takes a lot of blood, sweat, tears, and blood.

March of the Lich King.name: Bonelord Frostwhisper
March of the Lich King.text: Deathrattle: For the rest of the game, your first card each turn costs (0). You die in 3 turns.
March of the Lich King.flavor: Downside? Not if you want to be a Death Knight!

March of the Lich King.name: Death Beetle
March of the Lich King.text: Taunt Manathirst (@): Gain +4/+4 and Charge.
March of the Lich King.flavor: Well that'll be useless next expansion. WINK WINK.

March of the Lich King.name: Felscale Evoker
March of the Lich King.text: [x]Battlecry: If you've cast three spells while holding this, summon a different Demon from your deck.@ ({0} left!)@ (Ready!)
March of the Lich King.flavor: So it’s a demon and a naga, but NOT a dragon?

March of the Lich King.name: Fleshshaper
March of the Lich King.text: Taunt. Battlecry: If you have 5 or more Armor, summon a copy of this.
March of the Lich King.flavor: Even THIS is better than paper straws.

March of the Lich King.name: Hope of Quel'Thalas
March of the Lich King.text: [x]After your hero attacks, give your minions +1/+1 (wherever they are).
March of the Lich King.flavor: Hey, give me a minute. I just need to load my.... uh, hope.

March of the Lich King.name: Life from Death
March of the Lich King.text: [x]Draw 3 cards. Infuse (@): This costs (1).
March of the Lich King.flavor: Just because you came up with a nicer name for it doesn't mean that necromancy is any more justified.

March of the Lich King.name: Rivendare, Warrider
March of the Lich King.text: Deathrattle: Shuffle the other 3 Horsemen into your deck.
March of the Lich King.flavor: More like the 4 Horsemen of the "Can't Get Here On Time."

March of the Lich King.name: Shatterskin Gargoyle
March of the Lich King.text: Taunt Deathrattle: Deal 4 damage to a random enemy.
March of the Lich King.flavor: Don't worry, this one's just a statue.
March of the Lich King.howToGetSignature: Earnable in The Lich King's Call special event.

March of the Lich King.name: Silverfury Stalwart
March of the Lich King.text: Taunt, Rush Can't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers.
March of the Lich King.flavor: Don't strike until you see the whites of their teeth.

March of the Lich King.name: Sister Svalna
March of the Lich King.text: Battlecry: Permanently add a Vision of Darkness to your hand.
March of the Lich King.flavor: Hello darkness my old friend.

March of the Lich King.name: The Purator
March of the Lich King.text: [x]Taunt Battlecry: If your deck has no Neutral cards, draw a minion of each minion type.
March of the Lich King.flavor: With the rise of the undead, the Curator sees it as his duty to take care of them.

March of the Lich King.name: Unending Swarm
March of the Lich King.text:
Resurrect all friendly minions that cost (2)
or less.
March of the Lich King.flavor: swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm -

March of the Lich King.name: Alexandros Mograine
March of the Lich King.text: Battlecry: For the rest of the game, deal 3 damage to your opponent at the end of your turns.
March of the Lich King.flavor: Mo' graine, mo' problems.
March of the Lich King.howToGetSignature: Obtainable in March of the Lich King card packs.

March of the Lich King.name: Anachronos
March of the Lich King.text: [x]Battlecry: Send all other minions 2 turns into the future.
March of the Lich King.flavor: "That's it, you're all in time out!"

March of the Lich King.name: Dar'Khan Drathir
March of the Lich King.text: [x]Lifesteal At the end of your turn, deal 6 damage to the enemy hero.
March of the Lich King.flavor: You're telling me that you didn't suspect him of being evil, even though the first four letters of his name are D-A-R-K?
March of the Lich King.howToGetSignature: Obtainable in March of the Lich King card packs.

March of the Lich King.name: Faithful Companions
March of the Lich King.text: [x]Discover a Beast from your deck and summon it. Manathirst (@): Also summon a copy of it.
March of the Lich King.flavor: That's just how they cuddle!

March of the Lich King.name: Frost Queen Sindragosa
March of the Lich King.text: Colossal +2 After an enemy minion is Frozen, destroy it.
March of the Lich King.flavor: With her final breath, Sindragosa cursed her consort and all who abandoned her to die in Icecrown. When she was reborn by the hands of the Lich King, her first freezing exhale wrought only pain.

March of the Lich King.name: Lor'themar Theron
March of the Lich King.text: Battlecry: Double the stats of all minions in your deck.
March of the Lich King.flavor: Out of all his life accomplishments, making a 2/2 Tinyfin is his finest.
March of the Lich King.howToGet: Unlocked with "Enchanted to Defeat You" Achievement.
March of the Lich King.howToGetSignature: Obtainable in March of the Lich King card packs.
March of the Lich King.howToGetDiamond: Obtained by purchasing the Diamond Lor'themar Theron card.

March of the Lich King.name: Underking
March of the Lich King.text: [x]Rush Battlecry and Deathrattle: Gain 6 Armor.
March of the Lich King.flavor: "Behold, the Underking! I'm always beneath you, but nothing is beneath me! I hereby declare war on peace and happiness! Soon, all will tremble before me!"

March of the Lich King.name: Vengeful Walloper
March of the Lich King.text: Rush. Costs (1) less for each Outcast card you've played this game.
March of the Lich King.flavor: If you can't beat 'em, beat WITH 'em!

March of the Lich King.name: Anub'Rekhan
March of the Lich King.text: Battlecry: Gain 5 Armor. Your next 3 minions this turn cost Armor instead of Mana.
March of the Lich King.flavor:
"Who's that?"
"A noob, I reckon."
March of the Lich King.howToGetSignature: Obtainable in March of the Lich King card packs.

March of the Lich King.name: Arcane Defenders
March of the Lich King.text: Summon two 5/6 Golems with Taunt and "Can't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers."
March of the Lich King.flavor: *Arcane batteries not included*

March of the Lich King.name: Blightblood Berserker
March of the Lich King.text: Taunt, Lifesteal, Reborn Deathrattle: Deal 3 damage to a random enemy.
March of the Lich King.flavor: He should really go see a dentist about that tusk. And a dermatologist. And a therapist.

March of the Lich King.name: Boneguard Commander
March of the Lich King.text: Taunt Battlecry: Raise up to 6 Corpses as 1/3 Risen Footmen with Taunt.
March of the Lich King.flavor: Commander? In Hearthstone!? FINALLY!

March of the Lich King.name: Crypt Keeper
March of the Lich King.text: Taunt. Costs (1) less for each Armor you have.
March of the Lich King.flavor: How many crypts could a Crypt Keeper keep if a Crypt Keeper could keep crypts?

March of the Lich King.name: Invincible
March of the Lich King.text: [x]Reborn Battlecry and Deathrattle: Give another random friendly _____Undead +5/+5 and Taunt.____
March of the Lich King.flavor: No it's not, I can see it right there.
March of the Lich King.howToGetSignature: Obtainable in March of the Lich King card packs.

March of the Lich King.name: Soulstealer
March of the Lich King.text: [x]Battlecry: Destroy all other minions. Gain 1 Corpse for each enemy destroyed.
March of the Lich King.flavor: "Wanna see what destruction looks like? Here it is in undead form - it's your boy Soulstealer!"

March of the Lich King.name: Brutal Annihilan
March of the Lich King.text: [x]Taunt, Rush After this minion survives damage, deal that amount to the enemy hero.
March of the Lich King.flavor: Sometimes, problems can be solved by throwing everything you've got at it. This is not one of those times.

March of the Lich King.name: Flesh Behemoth
March of the Lich King.text: [x]Taunt Deathrattle: Draw another Undead and summon a copy of it.
March of the Lich King.flavor: Perfect for fleshing out your Undead deck.

March of the Lich King.name: Grand Magister Rommath
March of the Lich King.text: [x]Battlecry: Recast each spell you've cast this game that didn't start in your deck.
March of the Lich King.flavor: A powerful mage known for his proficiencies in Fire, Frost, and Algebra.
March of the Lich King.howToGetSignature: Obtainable in March of the Lich King card packs.
March of the Lich King.howToGetDiamond: Earnable after purchasing the March of the Lich King Tavern Pass.

March of the Lich King.name: Overlord Drakuru
March of the Lich King.text: [x]Rush, Windfury After this attacks and kills a minion, resurrect it on your side.
March of the Lich King.flavor: Overlord: (1)
March of the Lich King.howToGetSignature: Obtainable in March of the Lich King card packs.

March of the Lich King.name: The Sunwell
March of the Lich King.text: Fill your hand with random spells. Costs (1) less for each other card in your hand.
March of the Lich King.flavor: The Lich King had extinguished the light of the Sunwell once before - it will take all the might Silvermoon can muster to defend it!
March of the Lich King.howToGet: Earnable after opening a March of the Lich King card pack.
March of the Lich King.howToGetGold: Earnable after purchasing the March of the Lich King Tavern Pass.

March of the Lich King.name: From De Other Side
March of the Lich King.text:
Summon a copy of each minion in your hand.
They attack random enemy minions, then die.
March of the Lich King.flavor: Why did Drakuru cross the road?

March of the Lich King.name: Thaddius, Monstrosity
March of the Lich King.text: [x]Taunt Your odd-Cost cards cost (1). (Swaps polarity each turn!)@[x]Taunt Your even-Cost cards cost (1). (Swaps polarity each turn!)
March of the Lich King.flavor: Feugen is positive that Thaddius will see play, but Stalagg seems negative about it.
March of the Lich King.howToGetDiamond: Obtained by purchasing the Golden Return to Naxxramas Mini-Set.
